channel.title: Read and help please
channel.description:
[code]sendQuest("@red@hitpoints: @whi@"+currentHealth, 15899);[/code]
ive added this in my server panel it works with complie but when you get hit it dont go down or up when its orginaly 10
example hitpoints: 10
a monsters or player hits me with a 5 it dont go down 5 i eat a manta ray it dont go up
it goes up in the stats thing but not on my server panel but if i log out and in it changes is there any thing im doing wrong
thanks ~~Alex~~

item.title: Read and help please
item.dc:creator: @Season-Scape Season-Scape
item.description:
